name: v2_releases
schema: CREATE TABLE `v2_releases` (`download_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `entity_id` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `entity_type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `is_latest` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `release_date` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `release_notes` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `sha256` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
